articles.title: Sena Rebel Eknath Shinde, MLAs Leave Gujarat For Assam: 10 Points
articles.description: Shiv Sena rebel Eknath Shinde, camping out in Surat with 21 MLAs, was joined this evening by two more MLAs, shortly before they flew to Guwahati. Mr Shinde is at the centre of the deep political crisis in Maharashtra.
